body: Moamop´         NPS  Datura Wrightii  Paiute people used the dark green leaves of datura, crushed as a poultice, to treat sores and swelling. This traditional medicinal plant was chewed to reduce toothache pain, as well as induce visions. Datura is highly poisonous.          << back   continue >>
title: Pipe Spring National Monument: Moamop´
